title: What changed in the last 7 days
text:
Time window: since 2025-09-29T06:59:42Z (UTC).

Class repo commits
Temporarily unavailable (HTTP 404). Try again later.


Student repo commits

2025-10-06 06:05:30 UTC — CI: update public sources (2025-10-06) (#7)

Co-authored-by: CI Bot ci-bot@users.noreply.github.com (717ab0c) - 2025-10-06 03:55:08 UTC — fix: update backport trigger with complete payload and pagination
Critical fixes: - Add merge_commit_sha field (required for provenance) - Add files array with pagination support (handles PRs with >100 files) - Add path filter (only trigger on src/latex/** or src/R/** changes) - Use repository-dispatch action instead of curl - Include all file metadata (status, previous_filename, additions, deletions)
This matches the specification in STUDENT_REPO_WORKFLOW_UPDATE.md (4a82174) - 2025-10-06 02:19:06 UTC — feat: add workflow to trigger backport on PR merge
When a PR is merged in the student repo, this workflow triggers a repository_dispatch event in the private repo to backport the changes.
The backport workflow will: - Fetch the PR patch - Remap paths (src/latex -> overleaf/Fall 2025, src/R -> R) - Apply changes directly if clean, or create PR if conflicts exist - Include attribution: “(students#N by @author)” (75dd489) - 2025-10-06 00:44:54 UTC — Merge pull request #3 from fernando-duarte/ci-update-sources-20251005-222304
CI: Update public sources (2025-10-05) (8917e1f) - 2025-10-05 22:23:04 UTC — CI: update public sources (2025-10-05) (64bd1c0) - 2025-10-05 18:29:36 UTC — Initial commit to main (464748e)

title: Slides (2025)
text:
#| error: false
ls -1 static/slides/2025 2>/dev/null | sed 's|^|- [|; s|$|](../static/slides/2025/&)|' || echo "*No slides available yet*"

title: In-class Notability Notes (2025)
text:
All lectures
ls -1 static/notability/2025/*-In-class-notes.pdf 2>/dev/null | sort | sed 's|^|- [|; s|$|](../../&){download=true}|'

title: Shared R Code (2025)
text:
#| error: false
find static/code/2025 -type f -name '*.R' 2>/dev/null | sort | sed 's|^|- [|; s|$|](../&){download=true}|' || echo "*No R code available yet*"

title: Source Code (LaTeX & R)
text:
#| error: false
find static/src/latex -type f \( -name '*.tex' -o -name '*.sty' -o -name '*.cls' \) 2>/dev/null | sort \
  | sed 's|^|- [|; s|$|](../&){download=true}|' || echo "*No LaTeX sources exported yet*"
